statements: SELECT * FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy;
SELECT policy_name, implementation_date, policy_status FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy;
SELECT policy_id, policy_description FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy WHERE policy_status = 'implemented';
SELECT * FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy GROUP BY policy_name;
SELECT * FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy ORDER BY policy_name DESC, implementation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND policy_status = 'implemented';
SELECT policy_name, responsible_person FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy WHERE media_organization LIKE 'ABC%' AND policy_status = 'draft';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies, AVG(policy_id) AS avg_policy_id FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy WHERE policy_status = 'implemented';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM DiversityInclusionPolicy WHERE policy_status = 'archived' ORDER BY policy_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM media_companies;
SELECT company_name, diversity_rating FROM media_companies WHERE diversity_rating > 3;
SELECT company_id, company_name, diversity_rating FROM media_companies ORDER BY diversity_rating DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee_data WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, diversity_training_completed FROM employee_data WHERE diversity_training_completed = true;
SELECT * FROM media_companies WHERE diversity_rating > 3;
SELECT company_name, diversity_rating FROM media_companies WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM employee_data WHERE diversity_training_completed = TRUE ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee_data WHERE position IN ('Manager', 'Director') ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, diversity_rating FROM media_companies WHERE company_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies;
SELECT company_name, policy_description FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_approval_date, company_name FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies ORDER BY policy_approval_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, policy_approval_date FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies WHERE policy_approval_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, policy_description, policy_approval_date FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies WHERE company_name LIKE '%Inc%' ORDER BY policy_approval_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies WHERE company_name='ABC Corp'
SELECT company_name, policy_description FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies WHERE policy_approval_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT p.company_name, t.tracking_details, c.change_description FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies p JOIN policy_tracking t ON p.id = t.policy_id JOIN policy_changes c ON p.id = c.policy_id
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS policy_count FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies GROUP BY company_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT company_name, MAX(policy_approval_date) AS latest_approval_date FROM diversity_and_inclusion_policies GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY latest_approval_date DESC
SELECT * FROM MediaCompanies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM MediaCompanies WHERE diversity_score > 0.5;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM MediaEmployees WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT company_name, diversity_score FROM MediaCompanies ORDER BY diversity_score DESC;
SELECT metric_name, actual_value FROM DiversityMetrics WHERE target_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MediaCompanies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM MediaCompanies ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM MediaEmployees WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT metric_name, goal_value, actual_value FROM DiversityMetrics WHERE actual_value > goal_value;
SELECT company_name, initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM MediaCompanies INNER JOIN InclusionInitiatives ON MediaCompanies.company_id = InclusionInitiatives.company_id;
SELECT * FROM MediaCompanies;
SELECT company_name, diversity_rating FROM MediaCompanies ORDER BY diversity_rating DESC;
SELECT show_title, viewership_count FROM Shows WHERE viewership_count > 1000000;
SELECT cast_name, role FROM CastMembers WHERE role LIKE '%Lead%';
SELECT company_name, year, diversity_score FROM DiversityReports JOIN MediaCompanies ON DiversityReports.company_id = MediaCompanies.company_id;
SELECT * FROM MediaCompanies ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT company_name, diversity_rating, inclusion_rating FROM MediaCompanies WHERE diversity_rating > 4.5
SELECT show_title, viewership_count FROM Shows WHERE viewership_count > 100000 ORDER BY viewership_count DESC
SELECT cast_name, role FROM CastMembers WHERE show_id = 3
SELECT * FROM InclusionFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
